name: 00 - What's ya need to get going

pages.title: A Starting Point
pages.text: The upmost item needed.$(br) It is suggested to get 5-30ish per Chocobo (based on luck)$(br)-$(l:chococraft:showcase/greens)Example Locations$(/l)

pages.title: Chocobo Feather
pages.text: 1 $(item)Chocobo Feather$() will be needed$(br)Just stay near some for enough time & they drop.

pages.title: The Chocobo Saddle
pages.text: You will Need one of these.$(br)This is the easiest recipe to get for the most part.

pages.title: The Chocobo Saddle
pages.text: You will Need one of these.$(br)This is only viable if you've already access to a regular saddle.
